channel.title: inSilecoMisc on inSileco
channel.description: Recent content in inSilecoMisc on inSileco

item.title: inSilecoMisc 0.4.0 (part 1/2)
item.description: inSilecoMisc inSilecoMisc is an R ðŸ“¦ I have been maintaining for four years now. It was originally designed as a convenient way to share handy functions. Instead of stacking them in my .Rprofile, I created a package and made it available on GitHub. inSilecoMisc is therefore a set of miscellaneous functions, just as other R packages (e.g. Hmisc) but as I frequently change its API, it is meant to stay in the experimental stage!

item.title: Creating empty data frames with dfTemplate() and dfTemplateMatch()
item.description: Creating a data frame is fairly simple but when you need to create a large empty data frame with columns that have different classes it takes several command lines. A few days ago, I decided to write a function to simplify this operation and I came to realize that such a function would actually be very useful to ease the row binding of data frames whose column names partially match.
